channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:22 Alarm response in Sumy region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 06:22 Alarm response in Sumy region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Сумська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 05:04 Alarm repulse in Dnipropetrovsk oblast. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community - Chervonogrigorivska territorial community
item.description: 🟡 05:04 Alarm repulse in Dnipropetrovsk oblast. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community - Chervonogrigorivska territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk_oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
